content: *welcome spring with the vernal socks this pattern works for both top-down and toe-up knitting with super simple yo k2tog lace flowers that look like daisies the design flows into a pretty floral gradient down the sides with a few blossoms scattered here and there on the top of the foot it s perfect for a sock knit-a-long and a fun way to add a touch of spring to your wardrobe * * top down cuff down * toe up * photo tutorial on short row for toe up sock * fully charted and written instructions for each size * free for duration of spring into summer sock-a-long **size** ---- small medium large **finished measurements** --------------------- foot circumference 7 7 8 8 5 inches/ 17 5 19 21 5 cm foot length adjustable choose a size with approximately 1 inch/ 2 5 cm of negative ease in the foot circumference note the eyelet flowers in this pattern make the sock fit relaxed the stitch counts have been adjusted to fit your size **materials** --------- yarn h&w comfort wolle-cashmere wellness 65% wool 25% nylon 10% cashmere 478 yards per 100 grams recommend needle size 1 set us #1 / 2 25 mm needles for knitting in the round notions wool needle for grafting stitch markers **gauge** ----- 32 sts/ 44 row = 4 inches/ 10 cm in stockinette **pattern notes** ------------- work from chart or written instructions according to your preference
